summary: This bill, HR 3671, proposes to rename the Federal building located at 300 West Congress Street in Tucson, Arizona, as the "Raúl M. Grijalva Federal Building." The bill outlines the designation and clarifies that any related references in laws or documents should reflect the new name. The bill was introduced to the House of Representatives on June 2, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
